header.title: for digital transformation
header.subtitle-1: We empower businesses to succeed in the digital landscape. Our expertise includes cloud-native development, software modernization and the seamless integration of cutting-edge technologies, including AI and GPT.

Grow your business with
modern digital products
and solutions

Employ AI and GPT

services.title: Our services
services.subtitle: Unmatched experience in the development of cutting-edge software

development.title: Cloud-native
development.subtitle: digital solutions development
development.description: We offer full advisory, mentoring, architectural design and software development services to enterprises in the process of digital transformation.
development.description-2: We help you to quickly set up enterprise grade solutions that digitize the entire interaction with your customers - to increase sales and increase customer satisfaction. We build software solutions using state-of-the-art technologies and solutions.

items.item-3: Faster development using cloud-native architecture, microservices and APIs

modernization.title: for the cloud
modernization.description: Sunesis offers software modernization services that revitalize legacy systems and enable businesses to remain competitive in today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape.
modernization.description-2: Our services ensure that your software infrastructure grows with your business - from replatforming and cloud migration to API and event-driven integrations that drive innovation and growth.

items.item-1: Solutions tailored to your specific business needs
items.item-2: Seamless cloud, API and event-driven integration
items.item-3: Integration with modern technologies and platforms

point-1.title: Get involved in the API economy overnight
point-1.description: We provide you with all the necessary building blocks to get involved in the API economy. Establish or engage in new value chains. Connect to other systems, share data efficiently, or integrate third-party services.

items.item-3: Integration of APIs with back-end systems

point-2.title: With a digital platform towards digital transformation
point-2.description: The Kumuluz Digital platform includes all the building blocks to achieve complete digital transformation, from data integration, API economy and digital building blocks for rapid digital applications development.

point-3.title: Modernize monolithic systems
point-3.description: With our platform, we take care of the integration and exchange of data between different systems. We upgrade your back-end systems so you can start a digital business.

development.title: advanced technology solutions
development.description: We eliminate obstacles that prevent the digitalization of business due to the lack of integration between different systems. We upgrade back-end systems with functionalities needed for digital business.

opportunities.title: Identifying opportunities
opportunities.subtitle: in the digital environment
opportunities.description: We conduct an online workshop for you and together identify how to digitize your business. We also prepare a plan for the development of a web or mobile application that will support sales.

concepts.title: concepts of digitization
concepts.description: We educate in the implementation of new concepts of digital transformation, such as cloud-native, microservice architecture, API, DevOps, IAM, Kubernetes and Docker.

items.item-2: Authors of open source framework for cloud-native application development
